パッケージ com.shimizukenta.property

    • booleanValue

      public boolean booleanValue()
      インタフェースからコピーされた説明: BooleanGettable
      Returns the value of this Boolean object as a boolean primitive.
      定義:
      booleanValue インタフェース内 BooleanGettable
      戻り値:
      the primitive boolean value of this object.
      関連項目:
      Boolean.booleanValue()

    • waitUntil

      public void waitUntil​(boolean condition) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      インタフェースからコピーされた説明: BooleanObservable
      Waiting until (condtion == this.booleanValue()).

      This is blocking method.
      If already condition is true, pass through immediately.

      定義:
      waitUntil インタフェース内 BooleanObservable
      パラメータ:
      condition - the boolean value
      例外:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting
      関連項目:
      BooleanObservable.waitUntil(boolean, long, TimeUnit)

    • waitUntil

      public void waitUntil​(boolean condition, long timeout, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit) throws java.lang.InterruptedException, java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
      インタフェースからコピーされた説明: BooleanObservable
      Waiting until (condition == this.booleanValue()).

      This is blocking method.
      If already condition is true, pass through immediately.

      定義:
      waitUntil インタフェース内 BooleanObservable
      パラメータ:
      condition - the boolean value
      timeout - the maximum time to wait
      unit - the time unit of the timeout argument
      例外:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting
      java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - if the wait timed out
      関連項目:
      BooleanObservable.waitUntil(boolean)
